Articles.Content:
Hi,

 

The 'Kerbadyne Engine Cluster Adapter Tank' part has a bug where if you have 'Rigid Attachment' on, it will break off your rocket on launch regardless of how much support you give it through struts.

 

For those who might be having trouble, just turn off 'Rigid Attachment' for the time being.  I have found it to be fine without any support.
